description: ![google pixelstand]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * > Pixel Stand wirelessly charges your phone. And when you dock your Pixel 3*,it does a whole lot more.[#pixel3](https://twitter.com/hashtag/pixel3?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)[#madebygoogle](https://twitter.com/hashtag/madebygoogle?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)<https://t.co/hyn6VWSJMb>>> *sold separately [pic.twitter.com/nHfRtgqLbs](https://t.co/nHfRtgqLbs)>> — Made by Google (@madebygoogle) [October 9,2018](https://twitter.com/madebygoogle/status/1049696865300701184?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)When docked, the Stand tilts your phone back slightly, making it easy to seeeverything on-screen. Hopefully nothingrude though.**Read more:[Best Android phones](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best/best-android-phones-3438996)**Album covers will appear on-screen if you’re playing music, and if you’re asmart home ninja with a Nest Hello video doorbell, you’ll get a live feed onyour Pixel handset’s screen when it’s docked on the Stand.It can also display things like your calendar and weather from the Stand, butGoogle wants users to predominantly interact with docked phones through GoogleAssistant.Here are some quick links to learn more about some of the other new productsannounced at Made by Google.  * **[Pixel 3 and Pixel 3 XL](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/google-pixel-3-release-date-specs-price-3316812) **  * **[Pixel Slate](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/google-pixel-slate-specs-release-date-price-3601351)**  * **[Google Home Hub](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/google-home-hub-uk-release-date-price-3583109)****Are you tempted by the Google Pixel Stand?
